faqs.question: How are the hostels at the CREC Tirupati?
faqs.answer: The college has neat hostels with spacious rooms. Food is good and the surrounding is clean with proper hygiene.

faqs.question: What is the average salary package ofCREC Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Ans.The average package is INR 3 LPA.

faqs.question: Does the CREC Tirupati provide transportation?
faqs.answer: Yes, the college provides buses to the students and faculty members from all parts of the Tirupati.

faqs.question: How many seats of MBA are allotted under management quota in CREC Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Ans.30% of the seats are allotted under Management Quota.

Section.name: About CREC
Section.description:
Chadalawada Ramanamma Engineering College (CREC) is a private autonomous college of engineering founded in 2004. It is located at Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh and is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Anantapur. The college is approved by AICTE & accredited with ‘A Grade by NAAC. It offers B.Tech at the UG level and M.Tech, MBA, MCA at the PG level. The college is equipped with outstanding infrastructure and has a training & placement cell.
